result.arabic_text: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذَنُوبٗا مِّثۡلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصۡحَٰبِهِمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ
result.translation: Mu vy’ukuri, abirenganije mu guhakana Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), baragenewe umugabane w’ibihano; nk’uwagenewe bagenzi babo bahakanye hambere yabo, ntibihutire rero gusaba guhanwa, kuko bitebe bitebuke, bategerezwa guhanwa.
